biomni.tool.literature.name: fetch_supplementary_info_from_doi
biomni.tool.literature.description: Fetches supplementary information for a paper given its DOI and returns a research log.

optional_parameters.name: output_dir
optional_parameters.description: Directory to save supplementary files

biomni.tool.literature.name: extract_url_content
biomni.tool.literature.description: Extract the text content of a webpage using requests and BeautifulSoup.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Webpage URL to extract content from

biomni.tool.literature.name: extract_pdf_content
biomni.tool.literature.description: Extract the text content of a PDF file given its URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL of the PDF file to extract text from

biomni.tool.literature.name: advanced_web_search
biomni.tool.literature.description:
Initiate an advanced web search by launching a specialized agent to collect relevant information and citations through multiple rounds of web searches for a given query.
Craft the query carefully for the search agent to find the most relevant information.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The query string that you want the agent to search for. May contain additional context or guidelines for the agent to follow.

optional_parameters.name: max_searches
optional_parameters.description: The max number of searches the agent may issue inside this request. The higher number of searches, the longer the returned results will be. You may tune this number based on the complexity of the query.

optional_parameters.name: max_retries
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of retry attempts with exponential backoff.

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: annotate_open_reading_frames
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Find all Open Reading Frames (ORFs) in a DNA sequence using Biopython. Searches both forward and reverse complement strands.

required_parameters.name: min_length
required_parameters.description: Minimum length of ORF in nucleotides

optional_parameters.name: search_reverse
optional_parameters.description: Whether to search the reverse complement strand

optional_parameters.name: filter_subsets
optional_parameters.description: Whether to filter out ORFs with same end but later start

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: annotate_plasmid
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Annotate a DNA sequence using pLannotate's command-line interface.

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_gene_coding_sequence
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Retrieves the coding sequence(s) of a specified gene from NCBI Entrez.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Email address for NCBI Entrez (recommended)

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_plasmid_sequence
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Retrieve plasmid sequences from either Addgene or NCBI databases based on the provided identifier.

required_parameters.name: identifier
required_parameters.description: Either an Addgene ID or plasmid name

optional_parameters.name: is_addgene
optional_parameters.description: Force Addgene lookup if True, force NCBI if False. If None, auto-detects based on identifier format

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: align_sequences
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Align short sequences (primers) to a longer sequence, allowing for one mismatch. Checks both forward and reverse complement strands.

required_parameters.name: short_seqs
required_parameters.description: Single primer or list of primers

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: pcr_simple
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulate PCR amplification with given primers and sequence.

required_parameters.name: sequence
required_parameters.description: Either a sequence string or path to plasmid file

optional_parameters.name: circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: pcr_complex_multi_primers
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulate PCR amplification with multiple primers, considering all possible primer combinations and their potential products.

optional_parameters.name: circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: digest_sequence
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulates restriction enzyme digestion on a DNA sequence and returns the resulting fragments.

required_parameters.name: dna_sequence
required_parameters.description: Input DNA sequence to be digested

required_parameters.name: enzyme_names
required_parameters.description: Names of the restriction enzymes to use for digestion

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the DNA sequence is circular (True) or linear (False)

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: golden_gate
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulate a GoldenGate cloning reaction with Type IIS enzymes like BsaI, BbsI, BtgZI, and BsmBI.

required_parameters.name: sequences
required_parameters.description: List of DNA sequences to assemble

required_parameters.name: circular
required_parameters.description: List of booleans indicating whether each sequence is circular

required_parameters.name: enzyme_name
required_parameters.description: Name of the Type IIS enzyme to use

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: oligo_assembly
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Assemble two DNA sequences into an oligo with overhangs. Automatically detects overhang type and length.

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: gibson_assembly
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulate a Gibson Assembly reaction to join DNA fragments with overlapping sequences.

required_parameters.name: fragments
required_parameters.description: List of DNA sequences to be assembled

optional_parameters.name: min_overlap
optional_parameters.description: Minimum length of overlapping regions between fragments

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: find_restriction_sites
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Identifies restriction enzyme sites in a given DNA sequence for specified enzymes.

required_parameters.name: enzymes
required_parameters.description: List of restriction enzyme names to check

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the DNA sequence is circular (True) or linear (False)

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: find_restriction_enzymes
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Finds common restriction enzyme sites in a DNA sequence and returns their cut positions.

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_primers_with_overhangs
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design two primers to amplify a target sequence with optional overhangs.

optional_parameters.name: min_primer_length
optional_parameters.description: Minimum primer length

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: find_sequence_mutations
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Compare query sequence against reference sequence to identify mutations.

required_parameters.name: reference_sequence
required_parameters.description: The reference sequence to compare against

optional_parameters.name: query_start
optional_parameters.description: The start position of the query sequence

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_molecular_cloning_instructions
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Returns molecular cloning instructions containing important notes about plasmid DNA sequences.

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: calculate_element_distances
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Calculate pairwise distances between elements on a DNA sequence/plasmid.

required_parameters.name: element_positions
required_parameters.description: List of dictionaries containing element name, start position (0-based), and end position

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_knockout_sgrna
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design sgRNAs for CRISPR knockout by searching pre-computed sgRNA libraries. Returns optimized guide RNAs for targeting a specific gene.

optional_parameters.name: species
optional_parameters.description: Target organism species

optional_parameters.name: num_guides
optional_parameters.description: Number of guides to return

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_golden_gate_oligos
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design complementary oligonucleotides with Type IIS restriction enzyme overhangs for Golden Gate assembly based on restriction site analysis of the backbone.

required_parameters.name: insert_sequence
required_parameters.description: Sequence to be inserted (e.g., sgRNA target sequence)

optional_parameters.name: enzyme_name
optional_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the backbone is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_oligo_annealing_protocol
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Return a standard protocol for annealing oligonucleotides without phosphorylation.

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_golden_gate_assembly_protocol
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Return a customized protocol for Golden Gate assembly based on the number of inserts and specific DNA sequences.

required_parameters.name: enzyme_name
required_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used

required_parameters.name: vector_length
required_parameters.description: Length of the destination vector in bp

optional_parameters.name: num_inserts
optional_parameters.description: Number of inserts to be assembled

optional_parameters.name: vector_amount_ng
optional_parameters.description: Amount of vector to use in ng

optional_parameters.name: insert_lengths
optional_parameters.description: List of insert lengths in bp

optional_parameters.name: is_library_prep
optional_parameters.description: Whether this is for library preparation

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_bacterial_transformation_protocol
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Return a standard protocol for bacterial transformation.

optional_parameters.name: antibiotic
optional_parameters.description: Selection antibiotic

optional_parameters.name: is_repetitive
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence contains repetitive elements

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_primer
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design a single primer within the given sequence window.

optional_parameters.name: primer_length
optional_parameters.description: Length of the primer to design

optional_parameters.name: min_gc
optional_parameters.description: Minimum GC content

optional_parameters.name: max_gc
optional_parameters.description: Maximum GC content

optional_parameters.name: min_tm
optional_parameters.description: Minimum melting temperature in °C

optional_parameters.name: max_tm
optional_parameters.description: Maximum melting temperature in °C

optional_parameters.name: search_window
optional_parameters.description: Size of window to search for primers

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_verification_primers
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design Sanger sequencing primers to verify a specific region in a plasmid. First tries to use primers from an existing primer pool. If they cannot fully cover the region, designs additional primers as needed.

required_parameters.name: target_region
required_parameters.description: Start and end positions to verify (0-based indexing)

optional_parameters.name: existing_primers
optional_parameters.description: List of existing primers with their sequences and optional names

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the plasmid is circular

optional_parameters.name: coverage_length
optional_parameters.description: Typical read length for each primer

optional_parameters.name: primer_length
optional_parameters.description: Length of newly designed primers

optional_parameters.name: min_gc
optional_parameters.description: Minimum GC content for new primers

optional_parameters.name: max_gc
optional_parameters.description: Maximum GC content for new primers

optional_parameters.name: min_tm
optional_parameters.description: Minimum melting temperature in °C

optional_parameters.name: max_tm
optional_parameters.description: Maximum melting temperature in °C

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_knockout_sgrna
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design SpCas9 sgRNAs for CRISPR knockout by searching pre-computed sgRNA libraries. Returns optimized guide RNAs for targeting a specific gene.

optional_parameters.name: species
optional_parameters.description: Target organism species

optional_parameters.name: num_guides
optional_parameters.description: Number of guides to return

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_golden_gate_oligos
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design oligos for Golden Gate assembly by identifying backbone overhangs and creating matching insert oligos.

required_parameters.name: enzyme_name
required_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the backbone is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: find_restriction_sites
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Identifies restriction enzyme sites in a given DNA sequence for specified enzymes.

required_parameters.name: enzymes
required_parameters.description: List of restriction enzyme names to check

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the DNA sequence is circular (True) or linear (False)

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: find_restriction_enzymes
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Finds restriction enzyme sites in a DNA sequence from a curated list of common enzymes.

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_oligo_annealing_protocol
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Return a standard protocol for annealing oligonucleotides without phosphorylation.

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_golden_gate_assembly_protocol
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Return a customized protocol for Golden Gate assembly based on the number of inserts and specific DNA sequences.

optional_parameters.name: num_inserts
optional_parameters.description: Number of inserts to be assembled

optional_parameters.name: enzyme_name
optional_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used

optional_parameters.name: vector_length
optional_parameters.description: Length of the destination vector in bp

optional_parameters.name: vector_amount_ng
optional_parameters.description: Amount of vector to use in ng

optional_parameters.name: insert_lengths
optional_parameters.description: List of insert lengths in bp

optional_parameters.name: is_library_prep
optional_parameters.description: Whether this is for library preparation

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_bacterial_transformation_protocol
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Return a standard protocol for bacterial transformation.

optional_parameters.name: antibiotic
optional_parameters.description: Selection antibiotic

optional_parameters.name: is_repetitive
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence contains repetitive elements

optional_parameters.name: is_library_transformation
optional_parameters.description: Whether this is a library transformation

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: annotate_plasmid
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Annotate a DNA sequence for common plasmid features using pLannotate.

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: align_sequences
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Align short sequences (primers) to a longer sequence, allowing for one mismatch. Checks both forward and reverse complement strands.

required_parameters.name: short_seqs
required_parameters.description: Single primer or list of primers

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_primer
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design a single primer within the given sequence window.

optional_parameters.name: primer_length
optional_parameters.description: Length of the primer to design

optional_parameters.name: min_gc
optional_parameters.description: Minimum GC content

optional_parameters.name: max_gc
optional_parameters.description: Maximum GC content

optional_parameters.name: min_tm
optional_parameters.description: Minimum melting temperature in °C

optional_parameters.name: max_tm
optional_parameters.description: Maximum melting temperature in °C

optional_parameters.name: search_window
optional_parameters.description: Size of window to search for primers

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: design_verification_primers
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Design Sanger sequencing primers to verify a specific region in a plasmid, using existing primers when possible and designing new primers as needed.

required_parameters.name: target_region
required_parameters.description: Start and end positions to verify (0-based indexing)

optional_parameters.name: existing_primers
optional_parameters.description: List of existing primers with their sequences and optional names

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the plasmid is circular

optional_parameters.name: coverage_length
optional_parameters.description: Typical read length for each primer in base pairs

optional_parameters.name: primer_length
optional_parameters.description: Length of newly designed primers

optional_parameters.name: min_gc
optional_parameters.description: Minimum GC content for new primers

optional_parameters.name: max_gc
optional_parameters.description: Maximum GC content for new primers

optional_parameters.name: min_tm
optional_parameters.description: Minimum melting temperature in °C

optional_parameters.name: max_tm
optional_parameters.description: Maximum melting temperature in °C

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: simulate_golden_gate_assembly
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulate Golden Gate assembly to predict final construct sequences.

required_parameters.name: enzyme_name
required_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used (e.g., "BsmBI", "BsaI")

required_parameters.name: fragments
required_parameters.description: List of fragments to insert, containing either name+sequence or name+fwd_oligo+rev_oligo

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the backbone is circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: perform_gibson_assembly
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Perform a complete Gibson Assembly workflow: linearize backbone, design primers, and simulate assembly.

required_parameters.name: replace_region
required_parameters.description: Start and end positions of region to be replaced (0-based)

required_parameters.name: fragments
required_parameters.description: List of fragments to insert, each containing name and sequence

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether final construct should be circular

optional_parameters.name: overlap_length
optional_parameters.description: Length of overlapping regions for Gibson

optional_parameters.name: primer_binding_length
optional_parameters.description: Length of primer binding portion

optional_parameters.name: min_gc
optional_parameters.description: Minimum GC content for primers

optional_parameters.name: max_gc
optional_parameters.description: Maximum GC content for primers

optional_parameters.name: min_tm_binding
optional_parameters.description: Minimum Tm for primer binding

optional_parameters.name: max_tm_binding
optional_parameters.description: Maximum Tm for primer binding

optional_parameters.name: min_tm_overlap
optional_parameters.description: Minimum Tm for overlaps

optional_parameters.name: backbone_amount_ng
optional_parameters.description: Amount of backbone to use in ng

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: simulate_gateway_cloning
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulates Gateway cloning by extracting an insert from an entry plasmid (between attL1 and attL2 sites) and inserting it into a destination plasmid (replacing the region between attR1 and attR2 sites).

required_parameters.name: entry_plasmid
required_parameters.description: Sequence of the entry plasmid containing the insert

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the plasmids are circular

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: get_gateway_cloning_protocol
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Generate a protocol for Gateway LR cloning to transfer a gene from an entry clone to a destination vector.

optional_parameters.name: entry_clone_concentration
optional_parameters.description: Concentration of entry clone in ng/µl

optional_parameters.name: entry_clone_amount_ng
optional_parameters.description: Amount of entry clone to use in ng

optional_parameters.name: destination_vector_concentration
optional_parameters.description: Concentration of destination vector in ng/µl

optional_parameters.name: include_calculations
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include calculations in the protocol

biomni.tool.molecular_biology.name: simulate_sequence_digestion
biomni.tool.molecular_biology.description: Simulates restriction enzyme digestion on a DNA sequence and returns the resulting fragments with their properties.

required_parameters.name: dna_sequence
required_parameters.description: Input DNA sequence to be digested

required_parameters.name: enzyme_names
required_parameters.description: List of restriction enzyme names to use for digestion

optional_parameters.name: is_circular
optional_parameters.description: Whether the DNA sequence is circular (True) or linear (False)
